title: Mars Transit in Eighth House: Intense Transformation, Hidden Power, and Crisis Management
summary: For Pisces Ascendant, Mars transiting the eighth house intensifies inner transformation, emotional depth, and situations involving shared resources. Sudden events may demand courage and swift response, testing emotional resilience. Passion runs strong beneath the surface, bringing interest in psychology, healing, or occult subjects. Power struggles over joint finances or intimacy can arise if control is mishandled. When energy is channelled consciously, this transit supports deep healing, fearless confrontation of fears, and the strength to emerge renewed after challenges.
closing: Mars in the eighth house urges Pisces Ascendants to face transformation bravely, turning inner intensity into healing strength.
